# PLAYER::GET_ENTITY_PLAYER_IS_FREE_AIMING_AT

## Summary
Returns TRUE if the player is free aiming at an entity

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **ENTITY_INDEX\*** entity: _INDEX of the target aimed at by the specified player will be returned by reference via EntityIndex

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns TRUE if it found an entity in your crosshair within range of your weapon. Assigns the handle of the target to the *entity that you pass it.
Returns false if no entity found.
